quote: Self-growth comes from being nurtured, not tortured. I had to learn this the hard way. On sale now: Iron Maiden. Only used once.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: You grow by educating yourself to be more aware and more conscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The living self has one purpose only: to come into its own fullness of being.
author: D.H. Lawrence,  Selected Essays

quote: There is nothing more important to true growth than realizing that you are not the voice of the mind - you are the one who hears it.
author: Michael A. Singer,  The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself

quote: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Growth in love comes from a place of absence, where the imagination is left to it’s own devices and creates you to be much more then reality would ever allow.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
author: Julius Erving

quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
author: Ronald E. Osborn

quote: We do not grow absolutely, chronologically. We grow sometimes in one dimension, and not in another; unevenly. We grow partially. We are relative. We are mature in one realm, childish in another. The past, present, and future mingle and pull us backward, forward, or fix us in the present. We are made up of layers, cells, constellations.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Change is not always growth, but growth is often rooted in change.Drizzt Do'Urden
author: R.A. Salvatore

quote: This above all: to thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: To be successful you have to be lucky, or a little mad, or very talented, or find yourself in a rapid growth field.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: For the wise have always known that no one can make much of his life until self-searching has become a regular habit, until he is able to admit and accept what he finds, and until he patiently and persistently tries to correct what is wrong. – Bill W.
author: Bill W.

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Only by examining our personal biases can we truly grow as artists; only by cultivating empathy can we truly grow as people.
author: Jen Knox,  After the Gazebo

quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The world helps you to keep evolving and hope it's for better. You have to rise above all the tragedies in life. You have to grow, and if you stop growing, you are old.
author: Hrithik Roshan

quote: It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Persistence, perseverance, and continuous improvement are the ingredients for forming a successful person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you believe in yourself sufficiently and are confident that everything that you desire is inside you then you will possess the ability to produce all that you wish for.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: In order to grow, I promise you'll have to let go of some habits. 10 times out of 10, they'll be the habits you're most in love with.
author: Brandi L. Bates,  Remains To Be Seen

quote: The consuming desire of most human beings is deliberately to plant their whole life in the hands of some other person. I would describe this method of searching for happiness as immature. Development of character consists solely in moving toward self-sufficiency.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Loving oneselfIs the most primalOf all survival mechanisms
author: Karen Hackel,  The Whisper of Your Soul

quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I see my upbringing as a great success story. By disciplining me, my parents inculcated self-discipline. And by restricting my choices as a child, they gave me so many choices in my life as an adult. Because of what they did then, I get to do the work I love now.
author: Amy Chua

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I've grown up a lot, I'm on my own, and I've learned some valuable life lessons.
author: Zac Efron

quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
author: Henri Bergson

quote: Self-education is the greatest self-liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Success is...knowing your purpose in life,growing to reach your maximum potential, andsowing seeds that benefit others.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The thing is, that world doesn't exist. All growing up means is that your realize no one will come along to fix things. No one will come along to save you.
author: Elizabeth Scott,  Love You Hate You Miss You

quote: I remainMistress of mine own self and mine own soul
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Grown ups are complicated creatures, full of quirks and secrets.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: ‎"With each experience we grow and become more aware of the inner beauty that lies within us. Ultimately we are truly our own leader. We lead the connection and flow of life that is our inheritance.
author: Rabbi Yossi

quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.
author: Les Brown

quote: Self-discipline is a form of freedom. Freedom from laziness and lethargy, freedom from expectations and demands of others, freedom from weakness and fear -- and doubt.
author: H.A. Dorfman

quote: ...you must always be yourself, and do things at your own pace. Someday, you'll catch up.
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: You become mature when you become the authority of your own life.
author: Joseph Campbell,  A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living

quote: If a person holds no ambitions in this world, he suffers unknowingly. If a person holds ambitions, he suffers knowingly, but very slowly.
author: Alan Lightman,  Einstein's Dreams

quote: The aim of life is self-development. To realize one's nature perfectly - that is what each of us is here for.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs.
author: Joan Didion,  On Self-Respect

quote: See yourself as the perfect creation that you are, but at the same time, recognize with sincere honesty, the areas of your life that are out of balance and get to work to improve and grow.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga
